Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: allergy \allergy\ n. 1. hypersensitivity to a particular substance. ``an allergy to bee venom so severe that a second sting may be fatal'' [WordNet 1.5] ||
allergy n : hypersensitivity reaction to a particular allergen; symptoms can vary greatly in intensity [syn: {allergic reaction}]
